Row.Text: Hmmm? So, you, who looks to be a mere peasant, claim to be the leader of another civilization? Well, as long as you're aware that all of your lands and treasures are rightfully mine, I'll let you continue to play king. Heh heh heh...
Tch. A mongrel such as yourself is unworthy of an introduction. Leave, before my patience wavers.
Was my victory ever in doubt? I am the king and owner of all you see. An ant has better odds against an elephant!
Bastard...you'll regret this claim of victory over me, you mongrel bastard!
Wh--no! How?! Impossible! How could YOU, a vile mongrel unfit to scrub my servants' chamber pots, defeat me?! Y...you BASTARD! Mark my words, I WILL have my revenge...!
Speak.
...hmm?
Until we meet again.
Goodbye.
Fair enough.
You already try my patience, offering me what is already mine. I will play at your game of bartering only if you offer a reasonable deal.
I already said offer a better deal.
Not good enough!
I am not interested.
Consider this a loan -- it WILL be taken back from you.
...how DARE you make a demand of Gilgamesh! I am the only one allowed to make demands here!
My army is in need of supplies - this can be profitable for us both.
Hrm, I feel my pile of riches grows boring. You can add to it now, or I can take what I like of yours later.
All right.
Very Well.
I must refuse.
No.
Talk.
Make it quick. I have a wedding to attend.
Care for a glass of wine?
Welcome.
Until we meet again.
Farewell, friend.
Acceptable.
You already try my patience, offering me what is already mine. I will play at your game of bartering only if you offer a reasonable deal.
I already said offer a better deal.
Not good enough!
Thank you, but we'll pass.
Consider this a loan -- it WILL be taken back from you.
...how DARE you make a demand of me, Gilgamesh! I am the only one allowed to make demands here!
See, I've cleared out a spot of honor for your belongings. How can you refuse such privilege?
Come, there are many great treaties to be drawn!
Certainly.
Certainly not.
That's unacceptable.
Proceed.
I'm listening.
Leave my sight, mongrel.
To stand before me like this...obviously, you place very little value on your life.
That is all.
Now, leave!
Deal.
You already try my patience, offering me what is already mine. I will play at your game of bartering only if you offer a reasonable deal.
I already said offer a better deal!
Not good enough!
Absolutely not, you filth!
Consider this a loan -- it WILL be taken back from you.
...how DARE you make a demand of Gilgamesh! I am the only one allowed to make demands here!
You will contribute to my amassed wealth. There is a spot open near my feet.
This is better than you deserve, but let it not be said that I am an unfair man.
Fine. Agreed.
You are mad!
That's unacceptable.
You cannot be serious!
Yes?
I grow bored of my luxuries and need entertainment. Die.
I grow bored of my luxuries and need entertainment. Die.
I've decided I've had enough of you playing at ruling my rightful lands. Step aside, or be pierced by a thousand swords!
I've decided I've had enough of you playing at ruling my rightful lands. Step aside, or be pierced by a thousand swords!
You seem to have misunderstood our relationship. I will only ever have one friend in this world, and it is not you. Die.
You seem to have misunderstood our relationship. I will only ever have one friend in this world, and it is not you. Die.

I have grown tired of allowing the supposed "leaders" of the "nations" in my world to pretend they rule my lands. It is far beyond time I did something about it...and I will begin with you, filthy peasant!

I have grown tired of allowing the supposed "leaders" of the "nations" in my world to pretend they rule my lands. It is far beyond time I did something about it...and I will begin with you, filthy peasant!
Ridiculous. You have no right to clean my sandals, let alone think about besting me in combat. This conversation is over; my soldiers will make short work of you!
Ridiculous. You have no right to clean my sandals, let alone think about besting me in combat. This conversation is over; my soldiers will make short work of you!
...pathetic. Unbelievable! For you to even have the audacity to declare war against your absolute superior! You will pay with more than just your life, you filthy mongrel!
...pathetic. Unbelievable! For you to even have the audacity to declare war against your absolute superior! You will pay with more than just your life, you filthy mongrel!
You seem to be mistaken about something. Just because I have a weak standing army does not mean you have the upper hand. You will face the full power of the Gate of Babylon...consider it an honor.
You seem to be mistaken about something. Just because I have a weak standing army does not mean you have the upper hand. You will face the full power of the Gate of Babylon...consider it an honor.

Hmm...heheheh. I was just thinking that all of this extravagant wine and my harem of the world's most gorgeous women were getting a little boring. A fight is just what I need to revitalize myself. Very well, I will allow you the honor of facing me in combat. Cherish it!

Hmm...heheheh. I was just thinking that all of this extravagant wine and my harem of the world's most gorgeous women were getting a little boring. A fight is just what I need to revitalize myself. Very well, I will allow you the honor of facing me in combat. Cherish it!
What? You believe you have a chance against me, Gilgamesh, the King of Heroes? Heh-ha! Bwahahahaha! Alright, fool! Entertain me to the best of your ability, then!
What? You believe you have a chance against me, Gilgamesh, the King of Heroes? Heh-ha! Bwahahahaha! Alright, fool! Entertain me to the best of your ability, then!
Interesting. I'm aware of what people claim about the might of your army. Very well. You will have the honor of facing Ea. Never will a more hallowed event occur in this world.
Interesting. I'm aware of what people claim about the might of your army. Very well. You will have the honor of facing Ea. Never will a more hallowed event occur in this world.
...you again. You disgusting cur! To make a mockery of me with those pathetic facsimiles of my treasures! To even think of besting me! Make no mistake, Faker. I won't make the same mistake twice.

Ohhh? Well, this was unexpected. To see my future bride, the weak little girl calling herself the King of Knights, again trying pathetically to run her country. Are you still worried about the "prosperity of your people" and other such drivel? It'd be laughable if it wasn't so endearing. Come now, let me take the burden of leading those people off your hands. All you have to do is submit entirely to me...

Rider. So we meet again. Have you perhaps went back to sleep, dreaming yet again of seeing your Okeanos? Well, I will say this. Though I will only ever have one friend in this world...I will admit that you are deserving of a small amount of respect. Cross me and you will die again, just like last time. Leave well enough alone, and you may finally fulfill that dream of yours.

...are you supposed to impress me with your supposed divinity? I bow to no Goddess! I am above even those who call themselves Gods and Goddesses -- I am the King of Heroes! Oppose me and you will perish like you were mortal.
